column2: Requirements: Vocal Skills:  Proficient in vocal techniques such as modulation, pacing, intonation, and enunciation. Versatility:  Ability to perform a wide range of accents, dialects, and vocal styles in multiple languages, including Kannada, Tamil, and Telugu. Acting Ability:  Strong acting skills to convincingly portray characters and convey emotions through voice alone. Professionalism:  Maintain a professional demeanor, punctuality, and reliability in all communications and engagements. Experience:  Previous experience in voice-over work is preferred but not required. However, a demo reel showcasing vocal range and versatility is essential. Technical Skills:  Familiarity with audio recording equipment, editing software, and studio protocols is advantageous. Language Proficiency:  Fluency in Kannada, Tamil, Telugu languages relevant to the target audience of the project. Creativity:  Creative thinking and the ability to bring a unique perspective to each project, elevating the overall quality of the voice-over

Read a pre-written script to make a voice recording that will overlay a video production.         Mark pauses and makes a note of desired expressions and inflections.         Pay attention to diction and pronunciation.         Take care of tone modulation and voice intensity while recording.         Adaptation of the rhythm of speech.         Meeting the expectations of the subject matter expert who has created the script.         Perform innovations, for example, multiple voices and voice changes.         Check the working of sound systems in recording studios.         Bring out the personality of the character through constant practice.         Make sure all the projects are delivered on time.         Requirement:          At least 3-5yrs of Prior experience in the industry.         A bachelor s degree in any field.         Excellent time management and organization skills.         Great interpersonal skills.         Proficiency with studio equipment.
column11: Interpersonal skills, Time management, Subject Matter Expert

column1: Hiring :: Video Anchor/Voice-Over Artist :: Noida :: Immediate :: 63
column2: Role & responsibilities   1. Voice-over for video content, Product/project presentation through videos,ensuring clarity, enthusiasm, and engagement. 2. Collaborate with content creators to understand video objectives and target audience. 3. Adapt voice tone and style to suit different video genres and themes. 4. Edit and refine voice recordings as needed. 5. Meet deadlines for voice-over assignments. Preferred candidate profile   1. Clear and articulate voice with good modulation. 2. Experience in voice-over or similar role. 3. Ability to take direction and feedback. 4. Strong communication skills.
column11: Voice Overs, Anchoring, Mass Communication, Journalism, Radio Jockeying, News Reading
